title: Student Technology-Enabled Learning: Language Acquisition and Digital Tool Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device usage experience and intermediate-level language proficiency
context.additional_context: Learners tend to use familiar daily technology tools (email, mobile devices, etc.) for learning, prioritizing accessibility and connectivity in the environment.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively utilize digital tools (email, mobile apps, cloud collaboration platforms) in the language learning process
Learners can efficiently communicate with peers and instructors by integrating technology in both online and offline environments
Learners can apply everyday technology usage experiences to language learning activities (vocabulary practice, grammar review, project collaboration, etc.)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
